name: lifelog
description: LifeLog - A comprehensive life organization application

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=frontend && npm run clean --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.setup:env: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); console.log('Setting up environment files...'); try{fs.copyFileSync('frontend/.env.example','frontend/.env'); console.log('✅ Frontend .env created')}catch{console.log('✅ Frontend .env already exists')} try{fs.copyFileSync('backend/.env.example','backend/.env'); console.log('✅ Backend .env created')}catch{console.log('✅ Backend .env already exists')}"
